channel.title: Ben Lobb
channel.description: Recent news about Ben Lobb, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Bayshore Broadcasting News Centre
item.description:
Feds Need Time to Fine-Tune
Huron-Bruce Conservative MP Ben Lobb says the Tory government needs time to fine-tune a new parliamentary agenda. Lobb is reacting to word that Prime Minister Harper says he intends to prorogue Parliament, which means the House of Commons will ...
